title: OnTop Clock for Android Wear
summary: Shows Clock all screen on your Android Wear! Also anti-sleep for short time!
description: Miss time / date while moved away from Watchface screen? Add small time display resides and always shown on top of your Android Wear watch! You can dismiss temporarily by shaking watch. Android Wear going back to watchface screen too quickly? You can shake watch to keep watch awake for a while.*Clock will be shown after screen goes to ambient mode and back on, with few second delay (configurable).Supports square and circle type display, fully customizable.- Fonts.- Text size, color.- Text position.- Rotate angle.- Customizable text, time, date, wear battery.- 2 clocks, local and favorite timezone for world clock.For keeping wear awake, shake few times (configurable) and wear vibrates 2 times and icon will be shown. Shake few times again to dismiss keep awake.*You need smart watch with Android Wear OS to use this app.Special Thanks to : Icons8.com for providing nice icons and author of fonts for providing beautiful fonts.
descriptionHTML:
Miss time / date while moved away from Watchface screen? Add small time display resides and always shown on top of your Android Wear watch! You can dismiss temporarily by shaking watch. Android Wear going back to watchface screen too quickly? You can shake watch to keep watch awake for a while.

*Clock will be shown after screen goes to ambient mode and back on, with few second delay (configurable).

Supports square and circle type display, fully customizable.

- Fonts.
- Text size, color.
- Text position.
- Rotate angle.
- Customizable text, time, date, wear battery.
- 2 clocks, local and favorite timezone for world clock.

For keeping wear awake, shake few times (configurable) and wear vibrates 2 times and icon will be shown. Shake few times again to dismiss keep awake.

*You need smart watch with Android Wear OS to use this app.

Special Thanks to : Icons8.com for providing nice icons and author of fonts for providing beautiful fonts.
